Method Detail

decode

public java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String encoded,
                               java.lang.String encoding)
                        throws URIException
Description copied from interface: URICodec
Decodes an percent-escaped string following URI rules and using the passed encoding.

Note: + remains +, while following URL rules it becomes a space.

Specified by:
decode in interface URICodec
Returns:
the decoded string, never null
Throws:
URIException - when
  • The syntax of the escaped uri is wrong.

decodeURL

public java.lang.String decodeURL(java.lang.String encoded,
                                  java.lang.String encoding)
                           throws URIException
Description copied from interface: URICodec
Decodes an percent-escaped string following URL rules and using the passed encoding.

Note: '+' becomes space ' ', while following URI rules it would stay plus '+'.

Specified by:
decodeURL in interface URICodec
Returns:
the decoded string, never null
Throws:
URIException - when
  • The syntax of the escaped uri is wrong.
